answers.answer: I would definately get this checked,have her eyes tested and have her test for a mild for of epilepcy.
Also have her checked for migraine.  There is a painless migraine that does not hurt but does temporarily reduce the vision.
thank yall very much for responding.. i had her eyes checked and they say nothing is wrong with them so they are gonna order blood work to check for diabetes and anemia

question: my child is 7 and she keeps losing sight in her eyes for a few seconds.. is something really wrong?
title: worried
